reviewText: This video series is not what you would expect.  It is NOT about the end times, Revelation, or any of that kind of thing.  It's about a whole 'nuther way of looking at life and living.  I will have taught this class three times in the past two years at our church.  I've  had people sit in on each of the classes, asking for another class so they can go over the material again because, "there's so much in there."  Not fluff material.  But understandable.
